reuters.title: FED'S JOHNSON SAYS INFLATIONARY FEARS CALMER SINCE LAST DISCOUNT RATE RISE
reuters.body: Infotron Systems Corp said James C. Castle has been named president and chief executive officer, succeeding James C. Hann, who becomes vice chairman and will focus on product technology issues. Castle had been president of TBG Information Systems Inc, a subsidiary of Thyssen AG <THYH.G>. Reuter 
